My PictureHouse

Welcome to your MyPicturehouse login area. If you have not logged in before please activate your card.Sign in to access your Membership information:

  • Check your remaining Member Free Tickets credits
  • Find out your Membership expiry date
  • Renew or upgrade your Membership
  • See all your purchases and rate films!
